key_themes_in_deity_archetypes.title: Key Themes in Deity Archetypes
points: Cosmic Forces: Deities embodying creation, destruction, sky, earth, and celestial phenomena
Human Concerns: Gods of war, love, healing, wisdom, and death addressing universal needs
Moral Ambiguity: Trickster figures challenging order while serving necessary functions
Gender Patterns: Sky fathers, earth mothers, and the balance of masculine/feminine divine
Cultural Values: How each tradition shapes archetypes to reflect their worldview

war_god.title: War God
war_god.description: Martial Valor & Combat Divine embodiment of warfare, from strategic battles to berserker rage. Explores Ares, Mars, Tyr, Indra, Sekhmet, and the dual nature of sacred violence.

death_deity.title: Death Deity
death_deity.description: Mortality & Afterlife Rulers of the underworld and guides of souls. From Hades to Anubis to Hel, exploring humanity's relationship with mortality and what lies beyond.

trickster.title: Trickster
trickster.description: Chaos & Transformation Divine disruptors who challenge cosmic order. Loki, Anansi, Coyote, and Hermes reveal how chaos serves creation and transformation.

wisdom_goddess.title: Wisdom Goddess
wisdom_goddess.description: Knowledge & Strategy Divine embodiments of wisdom, learning, and strategic thought. Athena, Saraswati, Thoth, and the sacred power of knowledge and intellect.

cosmic_creator.title: Cosmic Creator
cosmic_creator.description: Origin & Genesis Gods who shape reality from chaos. Brahma, Ptah, Viracocha, and the diverse ways cultures envision the birth of existence itself.

celestial_beings.title: Celestial Beings
celestial_beings.description: Stars, Sun & Moon Divine manifestations of heavenly bodies. Solar deities, lunar goddesses, and star beings illuminating the relationship between heaven and earth.

sky_father.title: Sky Father
sky_father.description: Thunder & Authority Thunder-wielding kings of the gods. Zeus, Odin, Jupiter, Indra, and the archetype of divine masculine authority and cosmic law.

earth_mother.title: Earth Mother
earth_mother.description: Fertility & Abundance Goddesses of earth, fertility, and nurturing life. Gaia, Pachamama, Demeter, and the sacred feminine principle of creation and sustenance.

love_beauty_deity.title: Love/Beauty Deity
love_beauty_deity.description: Passion & Desire Divine embodiments of love, beauty, and desire. Aphrodite, Venus, Freya, Kamadeva, and the sacred power of attraction and union.

healing_deity.title: Healing Deity
healing_deity.description: Medicine & Restoration Gods of medicine, health, and restoration. Asclepius, Dian Cecht, Eir, and the divine art of healing body and spirit.
